ing: 2 (10 ounce) cans chunk white chicken, drained
des: "I got this years ago. It's crazy good! Serve with chicken-flavored crackers."
ins: Mix cream cheese, sour cream, minced onion, onion salt, Worcestershire sauce, and cayenne pepper in a bowl until well-blended. Stir in the chicken, breaking up any large pieces. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
